# awscc_ses_multi_region_endpoint (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::SES::MultiRegionEndpoint



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

### Read-Only

- `details` (Attributes) Contains details of a multi-region endpoint (global-endpoint) being created. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--details))
- `endpoint_name` (String) The name of the multi-region endpoint (global-endpoint).
- `tags` (Attributes Set) An Array of objects that define the tags (keys and values) to associate with the multi-region endpoint (global-endpoint). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))

<a id="nestedatt--details"></a>
### Nested Schema for `details`

Read-Only:

- `route_details` (Attributes Set) A list of route configuration details. Must contain exactly one route configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--details--route_details))

<a id="nestedatt--details--route_details"></a>
### Nested Schema for `details.route_details`

Read-Only:

- `region` (String) The name of an AWS-Region to be a secondary region for the multi-region endpoint (global-endpoint)



<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String) One part of a key-value pair that defines a tag.
- `value` (String) The optional part of a key-value pair that defines a tag.
